Task Graph: {'task_graph': {'nodes': [{'id': 'task_1', 'label': 'Start with large peas.'}, {'id': 'task_2', 'label': 'Rinse the peas.'}, {'id': 'task_3', 'label': 'Steam until wrinkled.'}, {'id': 'task_4', 'label': 'Add melted butter, cream, salt, and pepper.'}, {'id': 'task_5', 'label': 'Mash until soft.'}, {'id': 'task_6', 'label': 'Eat immediately.'}], 'edges': [{'from': 'task_4', 'to': 'task_6'}, {'from': 'task_1', 'to': 'task_2'}, {'from': 'task_2', 'to': 'task_3'}, {'from': 'task_3', 'to': 'task_5'}, {'from': 'task_5', 'to': 'task_4'}]}}
gold_standard_response: ['To make mushy peas, start with 500g of large, fresh peas. Rinse the peas under cold water. Steam the peas for 10 minutes until they are wrinkled. Add 2 tbsp melted butter, 1/4 cup cream, a pinch of salt, and a pinch of pepper to the peas. Mash the peas until they are soft and creamy. The mushy peas are now ready to be eaten immediately.']

Scenario Name: How to Make a Pear Martini
Tools: ['Add ice to a cocktail shaker.', 'Add the vodka and pear liqueur to the cocktail shaker.', 'Stir the ingredients in the cocktail shaker with a bar spoon for five to ten seconds.', 'Strain into a cocktail glass.', 'Garnish with a pear slice.', 'Serve the drink.']
Task Graph: {'task_graph': {'nodes': [{'id': 'task_1', 'label': 'Add ice to a cocktail shaker.'}, {'id': 'task_2', 'label': 'Add the vodka and pear liqueur to the cocktail shaker.'}, {'id': 'task_3', 'label': 'Stir the ingredients in the cocktail shaker with a bar spoon for five to ten seconds.'}, {'id': 'task_4', 'label': 'Strain into a cocktail glass.'}, {'id': 'task_5', 'label': 'Garnish with a pear slice.'}, {'id': 'task_6', 'label': 'Serve the drink.'}], 'edges': [{'from': 'task_4', 'to': 'task_5'}, {'from': 'task_1', 'to': 'task_2'}, {'from': 'task_2', 'to': 'task_3'}, {'from': 'task_3', 'to': 'task_4'}, {'from': 'task_5', 'to': 'task_6'}]}}
gold_standard_response: ['To make a Pear Martini, follow these steps: First, add ice to the cocktail shaker. Next, add vodka and pear liqueur to the shaker. Stir the ingredients with a bar spoon for five to ten seconds. Then, strain the mixture into a cocktail glass. Garnish the drink with a pear slice. Finally, serve the drink.']

The last player remaining on the mat without falling is the winner.']

Scenario Name: How to Make Your CV Sound More Impressive
